duties_responsibilities.duty: Key daily transactions into the Accounting systems and ensure files are complete and maintained as needed.
Open mail, paper and electronic, to distribute to appropriate staff for approval and processing into the accounting system.
Prepare invoice backup support for the Project Accounting and Reporting team.
Assist staff with creating expense reports for timely submittal.
Maintenance of the Accounting files, electronic and paper, to ensure compliance with annual audit and client audit support needs.
Continuous focus on the safeguarding of company assets and maintains confidentiality with all financial documents and sensitive company and employee information.
Maintain and adhere to internal control structure.

education_certification.credential: Associates Degree Required, Bachelors Degree Preferred, Familiarity with Office 365 with focused experience with Excel
